page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF SURVEY AREA
page.content: The area is mostly villages and country_side.The churches are all old some very.Stapleton church was built in the 13th century.A lot of people own farms and at this time of year we are mostly growing cereal foods.Also a great amount of pasture land is in this farming area.Stapleton,Dorrington Exfords Green and Lower Common are just some of the villages in our area. Stapleton is a quiet little village just out of Dorrington.It has a church a village hall and a very old rectory. At Christmas Stapleton has a{Fete}to raise money for the church.The money is for a new organ.Dorrington is a big sort of village with a garage and a general sort of shop.Exfords Green is a tiny little village with a few houses and a farm.It has no transport such as buses.Lower Common has a pub and a little lane leading off the main
